Mapping Value: case when  GFPF.GFCNAP <> GFPF.GFCNAL THEN 'Non Resident' else 'Resident' end
inner join gfpf on leg_cust_id = gfpf.gfcus||gfpf.gfclc
left join bgpf on gfpf.gfcus = bgpf.bgcus and nvl(gfpf.gfclc,' ') = nvl(bgpf.bgclc, ' ')
left join sx20lf sx20lf on gfpf.gfcus = sx20lf.sxcus and nvl(gfpf.gfclc,' ') = nvl(sx20lf.sxclc, ' ')
